title: The Last New Year
itunes:title: The Last New Year
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Not all new years are happy...

***

Written by Michael Whitehouse and guest narrated by Steve Blizin, Nate Dufort, Atticus Jackson and Mike Delgaudio

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
